means: low-energy speech transmission 低能量语音传输

sentence.Network_en: He gripped his brother's arm lest he be trampled by the mob.
sentence.Network_cn: 他紧抓着他兄弟的胳膊，怕他让暴民踩着。

sentence.Network_en: They decided to retreat lest they would be between two fires.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们决定撤退,否则就要受两面夹击.

sentence.Network_en: Be careful lest you ( should ) fall from the tree.
sentence.Network_cn: 小心,不要从树上掉下来.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 转载四个字母的英文单词 - 豆丁网 ... lens n. 透镜,镜头 lest conj. 唯恐,免得 levy n. 征收，征税，征兵v.征收，征集，征用.
大学英语精读单词表(第一册) - 豆丁网 ... curtain n. 窗帘 lest conj. 唯恐，以免 anxiety n. 焦虑.
大学英语精读单词表(第一册) - 豆丁网 ... curtain n. 窗帘 lest conj. 唯恐，以免 anxiety n. 焦虑.
新编大学英语单词表(第一册) - 豆丁网 ... lamb n. 羊羔 lest conj . 惟恐， 以免 miserable a. 痛苦的.

list.abs: lest important 最不重要形容词比较级的用法: 形容词的比较级用于两个人或事物的比较,其结构形式如下: 主语+谓语(系动词)+ 形容词比较级+than+ 对比成分。.
Take time when time cometh , lest time steal away ., 时来必须要趁时 , 不然时去无声息.
arise , take your wife , and your two daughters who are here , lest you be consumed in the iniquity of the city .起来，快领你的妻子和你这里的两个女儿逃走，免得你因这城的罪恶同遭灭亡。

they should be quick to respond to letters editor , lest animal rights misinformation go unchallenged and acquire a deceptive appearance of truth .他们应该对报刊的读者来信及时做出反应，以防止动物权利的误导言论在毫无质疑的情况下横行，从而获得一副真理的面容。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English thȳ lǣs the 'whereby less that', later the læste

entry.def: If you do something lest something unpleasant should happen, you do it to try to prevent the unpleasant thing from happening.

example.ex: I was afraid to open the door lest he should follow me...
example.tran: 我不敢开门，唯恐他还跟着我。

example.ex: The president has gone along with the hardliners lest they be tempted to oust him...
example.tran: 总统同意了强硬派的意见，以免他们产生赶他下台的念头。

sentences.sentence: "she tiptoed lest her mother should hear her"

means.word_mean: 2. that (after verbs explicitly expressing fear etc.);

sentences.sentence: "he worried lest he should be late"

auth_sentence.content: But Washington must act quickly lest the moment vanishes.
auth_sentence.res_content: But Washington must act quickly lest the moment vanishes.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But Washington must act quickly lest the moment vanishes.

auth_sentence.content: Beware lest...Thou tell'st the story of thy love unseen.
auth_sentence.res_content: Beware lest...Thou tell'st the story of thy love unseen.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Beware lest...Thou tell'st the story of thy love unseen.

auth_sentence.content: Lest she should entangle her Feet in her Petticoat.
auth_sentence.res_content: Lest she should entangle her Feet in her Petticoat.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Lest she should entangle her Feet in her Petticoat.

means.word_mean: （引出产生某种情感的原因）唯恐，担心

sentences.en: I feared lest I should be late again.
Be careful lest you (should) fall from the tree.
sentences.cn: 小心, 不要从树上掉下来。

jushi.english: I feared lest I should be late again.
I ran as fast as possible lest I should be too late.
Be careful lest you (should) fall from the tree.
jushi.chinese: 小心,不要从树上掉下来。
